attributes.title: Cross Segment Traffic
Notice, Alert and Signature by Network Segment

kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON: {"highlightAll":false,"version":true,"query":{"language":"lucene","query":"(NOT event.provider:arkime) AND ((NOT event.provider:zeek) OR (event.dataset:(conn OR notice OR weird OR signatures OR software OR known*))) AND ((network.direction:(internal OR inbound)) AND (destination.ip:*) AND (destination.port:*) AND (NOT destination.device.service:*))"},"filter":[],"indexRefName":"kibanaSavedObjectMeta.searchSourceJSON.index"}
